translations.en:
: ** ğŸ¶ In front of you, a dog arrives, and circles you. He seems to want you to follow him!

ğŸ• Follow the dog.

translations.fr: ** | ğŸ• Vous perdez la trace du chien au bout de quelques minutes, il allait trop vite !
translations.en: ** | ğŸ• You lose track of the dog after a few minutes, he was going too fast!

translations.en: ** | ğŸ• You lose track of the dog after a few minutes next to a tree. Looking around you, you discover a lot of small coins scattered all over the place!

translations.en: ** | ğŸƒ After 15 minutes of chasing you manage to lose the dog, he didn't seem very friendly!

translations.fr: ** | ğŸƒ Vous continuez sans vous soucier du chien. Celui-ci n'insiste pas.
translations.en: ** | ğŸƒ You continue on your way. The dog does not seem to follow you.
